Quests.Name: The Oath
Quests.Description: This is a story about the oath, which is unbreakable untill...

Quests.Name: The Caves of Nibin-dum
Quests.Description: You have tracked the Orc raiders to their hold in the caves of Nibin-dum.

Quests.Name: Journey to Rhosgobel
Quests.Description: You have rescued the captured Woodmen, but you aren't safe yet.

Quests.Name: The Necromancer's Reach
Quests.Description: Orcs attack Rhosgobel after you arrive with the Woodmen villagers.

Quests.Name: Escape from Dol Guldur
Quests.Description: Radagast asks you to investigate Dol Guldur for the source of the growing evil in Mirkwood.
